TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract serializable beforefieldinit CustomContentState extends System.Object

summary.span: 可以巡覽單一來源內容的不同狀態，不用重新載入各個後續巡覽的來源內容。

span.span: enables the ability to navigate through different states of a single piece of source content without reloading the source content for each subsequent navigation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，不會儲存在瀏覽歷程記錄中的內容物件的執行個體。By default, does not store an instance of a content object in navigation history. 相反地，使用巡覽記錄中巡覽至每次建立內容物件的新執行個體。Instead, creates a new instance of the content object each time it is navigated to by using navigation history. 此行為被為了避免過多的記憶體耗用量在巡覽大量內容時。This behavior is designed to avoid excessive memory consumption when large numbers and large pieces of content are being navigated to. 因此，內容的狀態並不會記住從一個瀏覽至下一步。Consequently, the state of the content is not remembered from one navigation to the next. 不過，[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)]提供與一段內容的瀏覽歷程記錄項目產生關聯的自訂狀態的能力。However, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] provides the ability to associate a piece of custom state with the navigation history entry for a piece of content. 瀏覽歷程記錄項目相關聯的自訂狀態必須是衍生自類別。Custom state that is associated with a navigation history entry must be a class that derives from . 您建立的關聯物件與瀏覽歷程記錄項目使用下列技巧：You associate a object with a navigation history entry by using one of the following techniques: - 呼叫**AddBackEntry**:Calling **AddBackEntry**: - - - 。. - 設定任一下列事件引發時：Setting when one of the following events are raised: - - - - - 藉由實作上想要與其相關聯的自訂狀態的類別。By implementing on the class that wants custom state to be associated with it. > [!NOTE] > 如果您呼叫**AddBackEntry**方法，您必須處理**Navigating**事件或實作。If you call the **AddBackEntry** method, you must handle the **Navigating** event or implement . 瀏覽歷程記錄項目巡覽時[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)]檢查自訂物件是有與其相關聯。When the navigation history entry is navigated to, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] checks to see if a custom object is associated with it. 因此，它會呼叫如果以允許自訂套用它記住從先前的導覽狀態的物件。If so, it calls to allow the custom object to apply the state it remembered from the previous navigation. 自訂類別可以覆寫變更所顯示的瀏覽歷程記錄項目名稱物件有關聯。A custom class can override to change the name that appears for the navigation history entry to which the object is associated. 值，是從瀏覽可見，則傳回[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]個不同的導覽 ([!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)]， ， )。The value that returns is visible from the navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] of the various navigators ([!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)], , ). 類別衍生自必須是可序列化，這表示它必須至少夾帶，並選擇性地實作。A class that derives from must be serializable, which means it must at least be augmented with , and optionally implement . > [!IMPORTANT] > 當您將資訊儲存自訂內容的狀態時，您無法儲存任何參考執行個體的頁面，您會記住其狀態如果不想要保留在記憶體中的內容。When you store information in custom content state, you cannot store any references to the instance of the page for which you are remembering state if don’t want the content to be retained in memory. 這可防止[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)]釋放頁面執行個體和擊敗的目的預設巡覽記錄行為。This prevents [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] from releasing the page instance, and defeats the purpose of the default navigation history behavior. 如果您必須這麼做，請考慮使用改為。If you must do this, consider using instead. ## Examples 以下是範例會覆寫的實作。The following is an example of a implementation that overrides . [!code-csharp[CustomContentStateSnippets#MyCustomContentStateCODE](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CustomContentStateSnippets/CSharp/MyCustomContentState.cs#mycustomcontentstatecode)] [!code-vb[CustomContentStateSnippets#MyCustomContentStateCODE](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CustomContentStateSnippets/visualbasic/mycustomcontentstate.vb#mycustomcontentstatecode)]

summary.span: 儲存在巡覽記錄中之內容的名稱。

span.span: The name for the content that is stored in navigation history.

summary.span: 的值會顯示在 、 和 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ie7](~/includes/tlasharptla-ie7-md.md)] 巡覽 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] 中。

span.span: The value of is displayed from , , and [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ie7](~/includes/tlasharptla-ie7-md.md)] navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)].

value.span: 儲存在巡覽記錄中之內容的 名稱。

span.span: The name of the content that is stored in navigation history.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 儲存後和向前巡覽記錄中的項目通常會顯示從 [上一頁] 及 [向前] 下拉式清單導覽上的瀏覽按鈕[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]主機導覽器，包括的， ，或[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ie7](~/includes/tlasharptla-ie7-md.md)]。Entries stored in back and forward navigation history are typically available from the back and forward drop down navigation buttons on the navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] of the host navigator, including , , or [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ie7](~/includes/tlasharptla-ie7-md.md)]. 是瀏覽歷程記錄在下拉式清單中顯示的值。 is the value that is displayed in a navigation history drop down list. 並沒有覆寫。如果沒有，下列資料片段用來瀏覽歷程記錄項目名稱，依優先順序會自動建構： does not have to be overridden; if not, the following pieces of data are used to automatically construct a navigation history entry name, in order of precedence: - 。. - 和[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]目前頁面 and the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] for the current page - 目前頁面的 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]。The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] for the current page.

param.span: ，指定如何巡覽至 所要套用至的內容。

span.span: A that specifies how the content to which the is being applied was navigated to.

summary.span: 在發生巡覽時呼叫，以重新套用狀態至內容。

span.span: Called to reapply state to a piece of content when navigation occurs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 時，會呼叫項目都具有相關聯的巡覽記錄中巡覽至物件。 is called when an item in navigation history that has an associated object is navigated to. 衍生自抽象類別必須覆寫，雖然覆寫實作只需要呼叫基底方法。When deriving from the abstract class, must be overridden, although the override implementation need only call the base method.
